'''Men, Halflings and Hero Worship''' is a 1961 booklet written by [[Marion Zimmer Bradley]]. A later edition, illustrated by [[Judith Weiss]], was published by T-K Graphics (Baltimore) in [[1973]] (51 pp., ill. 22 cm, paperback).<ref name="Ake">[[Åke Bertenstam]],  "[http://www.forodrim.org/bibliography/tolklist.html A Chronological Bibliography of Books About Tolkien]" at [[Forodrim]]</ref>
